description: Ajvar is a delicious roasted capsicum and eggplant dip that is perfect served with grilled meats or crusty bread.
name: Balkan Style Ajvar Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 large red capsicums, cut in half

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 240Â°C. Line a baking tray with parchment and place the capsicum and eggplant halves on it. Cook for 30 minutes, until blackened.
Place the capsicum and eggplant in a large bowl, cover with clingfilm and set aside for 20 minutes. Peel away the skin of the eggplant and capsicums and discard.
Tip the roasted vegetables into a food processor, add the oil, garlic and vinegar and blitz to a coarse paste. Season with salt and pepper.
Pour the mix into a saucepan and simmer, stirring, on medium low heat for 30 minutes until thick.
